questions: Time taken by the bob to move from A to O is t1 and from O to B is t2. The time period of this simple pendulum is:

Sahil is explaining to Reema about the maximum and minimum temperature displayed daily in the weather bulletin. Which one is the correct explanation?
option1: Highest day temperature and lowest night temperature of the day.
option2: Highest day temperature and highest night temperature of the month.
option3: Temperature recorded at 12 noon and at midnight (00.00 hrs).
option4: Average highest temperature of day and average lowest temperature of night.

questions: A flag mounted on a flag post near the sea coast flutters in the direction of the sea. At what time of the day does this happen?

questions: During the formation of rain, what happens when water vapor changes to raindrops?

questions: What is the best thing to do when strong winds risk blowing over a hut having a weak thatched roof?
option2: Close all the doors and windows

questions: Following are precautions one must take in case a storm is accompanied by lightning. Which one of them is incorrect?
option1: Do not take shelter under a tree.
option2: Do not take shelter under an umbrella with a metallic end.
option3: Do not take shelter in open garages, storage sheds, etc.
option4: Do not take shelter in a bus in the open.
